summary: Email chain discussing adding victims of Jeffrey Epstein represented by the law firm Boies Schiller Flexner to a list for an upcoming hearing. The communication indicates coordination between legal representatives about victim identification and representation.

persons.name: Boies Schiller
persons.context: The law firm representing multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein, as mentioned in the subject line and email body discussing their client list.

events.title: Coordination on Epstein Victim List
events.description: Email exchange regarding adding victims represented by Boies Schiller Flexner to a list for an upcoming hearing, noting that the firm's list may not be comprehensive and that they have co-counsel arrangements.

locations.address: 401 E. Las Olas Blvd. Suite 1200 Fort Lauderdale, FL, 33301

keyFacts: The law firm Boies Schiller Flexner represents multiple victims of Jeffrey Epstein.
An email chain discusses adding these victims to a list for a hearing, indicating ongoing legal proceedings related to victim representation.
The communication notes that the firm's list of victims may not be comprehensive and that they have co-counsel arrangements with other firms.
The email includes a standard confidentiality notice regarding attorney-client privilege.
Specific individual names of victims or attorneys are redacted or not fully disclosed in the provided text.
